column4: okie dokie, I need some help.  Hopefully it is just something stupid I am not doing/missing...
I have a fresh install of Ubuntu 7.10 on this machine (Dell Latitude X1 laptop) but when I try to install anything, it does not allow me to

I click on Add/Remove and search for Scheme and get MIT-Scheme when I press on the checkbox it says "List of Applications not available to reload you need a working Internet connection"  note, I am talking to you on just such a connection... man, I wish I could type faster and read at the same time...
